alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Guernsey; Muskingum; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 4:59PM EDT until June 16 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GUERNSEY...SOUTHERN COSHOCTON...NORTHERN MUSKINGUM AND SOUTHWESTERN TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES... At 459 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newcomerstown, or 9 miles southwest of Uhrichsville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Coshocton, Newcomerstown, West Lafayette, Dresden, Frazeysburg, Port Washington, Conesville, Plainfield, Otsego, Boden, Cooperdale, and Bakersville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
